name: VM Templates With Disk Configuration Should Encrypt the Disks
description: VM Templates that provide storage configurations should have encryption enabled for the disks
body: W﻿hen VM Templates specify storage configurations, they should ensure that VMs created by using those templates have the disks encrypted
remediationDescription:
-﻿ Navigate to the Launch Template using the provided external link
-﻿ Select the actions menu and select `Modify template (Create new version)`
-﻿ Scroll down to `Storage (Volumes)`
-﻿ For each `EBS Volume` set `Encrypted` to `Encrypted`
